___status.description: Labels to assign to tickets with a specific status.

___custom-field.description: Labels to assign to tickets with one or more specific custom field value(s).

___tracker.description: Labels to assign to tickets of a specific tracker.

___priority.description: Labels to assign to tickets with a specific priority.

___base-uri.description: The base URL of your Redmine installation.

___username.description: Your Redmine username (must be an administrator).

___users-mapping.description: Describes how to map an assignee's Redmine user ID to his GitLab user ID.

___base-uri.description: The base URL of your GitLab installation (incl. API prefix).

___status.description: Labels to assign to tickets with a specific status.

___custom-field.description: Labels to assign to tickets with one or more specific custom field value(s).

___tracker.description: Labels to assign to tickets of a specific tracker.

___priority.description: Labels to assign to tickets with a specific priority.

___labels-mapping.description: Describes how to map Redmine ticket meta data to GitLab issue labels.

___private-token.description: Your GitLab private token (can be found in your account settings).
